Name: MCS
Description:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Umojan structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 3

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 2

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 1

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Normal Power Level

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

TBl1.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Warp to Location ability.

Enables:
- MCSs
TBl1.Name: Build Command Hub

TBl1.Tooltip: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
TBl1.Name: Build Distillery

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Supply Cache can be lowered to allow units to walk over them.
Can be upgraded into Energy Generator to provide Power Levels.

Enables:
- Academy at the MCSs
TBl1.Name: Build Supply Cache

TBl1.Tooltip:
Infantry-production facility.

Enables:
- Pretorian
- Commando
- Bunkers from MCSs
- Science Facilities from MCSs
- Shadow Ops at the MCSs
- Workshop at the MCSs
TBl1.Name: Build Academy

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Umojan infantry and structures.

Enables:
- Anti-Air Turrets from MCSs
- Engineering Tower from MCSs
TBl1.Name: Build Mechanics Bay

TBl1.Tooltip:
Defensive structure.
Infantry fights from inside.

Bonus: +1 range to units inside.
TBl1.Name: Build Bunker

TBl1.Tooltip:
Anti-air defensive structure.

Can attack air units.
Detector
TBl1.Name: Build Anti-Air Turret

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for all Umojan Units.

Enables:
- Energy Generator from Supply Cache
- Advanced units at all nearby production facilities
TBl1.Name: Build Science Facility

TBl1.Tooltip: Support defensive structure, can repair nearby mechanical ally and build defensive structures.
TBl1.Name: Build Engineering Tower

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl2.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Shadowguards. Can build Nukes for Shadowguards.

Enables:
- Shadowguards at the Academy
TBl2.Name: Build Shadow Ops

TBl2.Tooltip:
Vehicle-production facility.

Enables:
- Battlecat
- Norns
- Foundry at the MCSs
TBl2.Name: Build Workshop

TBl2.Tooltip:
Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Workshop and Shipyard units.

Enables:
- Battle Tank at the Workshop
- Whirlwind at the Workshop
TBl2.Name: Build Foundry

TBl2.Tooltip:
Air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Mist
- Howler
TBl2.Name: Build Shipyard

TBl2.Tooltip:
Contains Battleship, Crow, Aloe and Whirlwind upgrades.

Enables:
- Battleship at the Shipyard
- Crow at the Shipyard
- Frenrir at the Command Hub
TBl2.Name: Build Fleet Core

TBl2.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl2.Name: Cancel
